description: This JSON Schema describes a set of images acquired during the course of a SEM/FIB Tomography experiment.  The images in each dataset is taken using a detector (SE, BSE, EDS, EBSD) using a specific configuration. This Schema contains only the parameters which are specific to the entire dataset. The parameters which are particular to each image is located at https://github.com/kit-data-manager/Metadata-Schemas-for-Materials-Science/blob/main/SEM_FIB_Tomography/Acquisition_Image.json The units are by default to be considred as the SI units unless otherwise specified
title: acquisition_dataset

entry.description: The entry level is the root element of the schema. It contains all the metadata describing a single image.

entryID.description: (Optional)- Identifier of the dataset. It could be the PID of location where the entire dataset is stored

definition.description: (Required)- Name of the schema to which this entry conforms. In this case, acquisition_dataset should be written

user.description: (Optional)- The contact information of the user responsible for the measurement

program.description: (Required)- Details concerning the program (or software) used for aquisition

datasetType.description: (Required) - To be selected from the enumerated list depending on the detector and the angle at which the sample is measured: * SEM Image * SEM Image 2 * EDS * EBSD * BSE

numberOfItems.description: (Required) - Number of Items (images, files). Depends on the number of slices

rows.description: (Optional) - Number of rows in the tiled image grab setting

columns.description: (Optional) - Number of column in the tiled image grab setting

tileColumn.description: (Optional) - The selected column in the tiled image grab setting

tileRow.description: (Optional) - The selected row in the tiled image grab setting

displayedEnergyLevel.description: (Optional) - The displayed energy level on the detector

images.description: (Required) - The displayed energy level on the detector

user.description: Contact information of the user responsible for the measurement.

userName.description: (Required) - Full name of the user recommended in the format (Family Name, Given Name)

role.description: (Optional) - Role of the user to be selected from: *Data Curator *Instrument Scientist *Team Leader *Team Member

affiliation.description: (Optional) - Details of the institution to which the user is affiliated

institutionID.description: (Optional) -Identifier of the institution to which the user is affiliated

identifierValue.description: (Optional) - String containing the value of an identifier

identifierType.description: (Optional) - Type of the identifier to be chosen from a controlled list of values (*ROR *GRID *ISNI *URL *DOI *Handle)

ORCID.description: (Optional) - Open Researcher and Contributor ID expressed as a URI

user.title: user

program.description: (Optional) - Details concerning the program (or software) used for aquisition.

programName.description: (Optional) - Name of the program (or software) used for acquisition

program.title: program

instrumentDetails.description: (Required) - Details giving the relevant components and settings of the instrument.

spot.description: (Optional) - A number representing the spot selected. eg. 1

hotStageMEMS.description: (Optional) - Pressure maintained inside the chamber (in which the sample is housed) during the measurement

instrumentDetails.title: instrumentDetails

identifierValue.description: (Optional) - String containing the value of an identifier

identifierType.description: (Optional) - Type of the identifier to be selected from: *ROR *GRID *ISNI *URL *DOI *Handle *String

eBeamDetails.description: (Required) - Describes the configuration of the electron beam.

accelerationVoltage.description: (Required) - The potential difference between anode and cathode. The acceleration voltage adds kinetic energy to the particles of the beam. IRI: https://iris.hmc-services.de/EM_Glossary/term_00000015 It is defined separately as voltageDetails, (includes the voltage value, optional qualifier like max or min, optional note of the type string, and a controlled list of units from which one can be chosen - uV, mv, V, kV, MV)

beamCurrent.description: (Optional) - Electrical current which flows along the beam path. IRI: https://iris.hmc-services.de/EM_Glossary/term_00000005 It is defined separately as currentDetails (includes the current value, optional qualifier like max or min, optional note of the type string, and a controlled list of units from which one can be chosen - pA, nA, uA, mA, A, kA)

scanRotation.description: (Required) - Angle by which beam scanning direction is rotated

imageMode.description: (Required) - The type of image mode used

apertureSetting.description: (Required) - The setting for controlling the aperture size, using either the aperture size directly or indirectly using the beam current. Therefore one of the two properties must be selected: size or current.

size.description: (Optional) - the size (diameter) of the aperture which can be directly controlled using the instrument settings defined separately as distanceDetails.

current.description: (Optional) - the beam current setting which would indirectly control the size of the aperture defined separately as currentDetails

horizontalFieldWidth.description: (Required) - the actual horizontal length scanned on the sample defined separately as distanceDetails.

verticalFieldWidth.description: (Required) - the actual vertical length scanned on the sample defined separately as distanceDetails.

tiltCorrectionIsOn.description: (Required) - To bet set true if tilt correction is on

dynamicFocusIsOn.description: (Required) - To bet set true if dynamic focus is on

dynamicWDIsOn.description: (Required) - To bet set true if dynamic working distance is on

lensMode.description: (Required) - The type of image mode used

tiltCorrectionAngle.description: (Required) - the Angle set to correct the tilt of the sample.

preTilt.description: (Required) - the Angle set to correct the tilt of the sample.

magnificationCorrection.description: (Required) - To bet set true if magnification correction is on

scanType.description: (Required) - The type of scan E-Scan or I-Scan

dwellTime.description: (Optional) - Time period during which the beam remains on one position/stationary. IRI: https://iris.hmc-services.de/term_00000018

internalScan.description: (Required) - To bet set true if internal scan is on

pixelWidth.description: (Required) - the actual width of a pixel

pixelHeight.description: (Required) - the actual width of a pixel

horizontalFieldSize.description: (Required) -  the actual horizontal length scanned on the sample defined separately as distanceDetails

verticalFieldSize.description: (Required) -  the actual vertical length scanned on the sample defined separately as distanceDetails

average.description: (Required) - Number of images averaged at each slice

integrate.description: (Required) - Number of images integrated at each slice

frameTime.description: (Optional) -Time period during which a frame is fully scanned. IRI: https://iris.hmc-services.de/term_00000021

eScan.description: gives settings pertaining to electron beam scan

mainsLock.description: (Required) - To bet set true if mains lock is on

lineTime.description: (Optional) -Time period during which a line is fully scanned.

imageDetails.description: (Required) - describes the settings related to imaging

digitalContrast.description: (Required) - A number indicating the setting for digital contrast

digitalBrightness.description: (Required) - A number indicating the setting for digital brightness

digitalGamma.description: (Required) - A number indicating the setting for digital Gamma

numberOfPixels.description: (Required) - The number of x, y pixels of the image (Resolution), defined separately as pixelNumberType with separate entries for integer values of xPixels and yPixels

driftcorrected.description: (Required) - To bet set true if drift correction is on

zoomfactor.description: (Required) - A number indicating the zoom factor

postprocessing.description: (Optional) - Describes the post-processing performed on the image

transformation.description: (Optional) - Describes the transformations performed on the image

detectorDetails.description: (Required) - describes the settings related to the detector with which the image set is acquired

name.description: (Required) - The name of the detector used

ETD.description: (Required) - Details about the Everhart Thornley detector (ETD), which is a secondary electron and back-scattered electron detector used in scanning electron microscopes

ETDdetails.description: describes the parameters of the Everhart Thornley detector (ETD), which is a secondary electron and back-scattered electron detector used in scanning electron microscopes

mix.description: (Required) - A number indicating the signal mixing

grid.description: (Required) - A number indicating the number of grid elements

setting.description: (Required) - A number indicating the setting of the ETD

hotStageMEMSDetails.description: describes the parameters related if a hot stage MEMS is used

heatingCurrent.description: (Required) - Describes the heating current used in the hot stage MEMS

heatingVoltage.description: (Required) - Describes the heating voltage used in the hot stage MEMS

targetTemperature.description: (Required) - Describes the target Temperature set in the hot stage MEMS

actualTemperature.description: (Required) - Describes the actual Temperature measured in the hot stage MEMS

heatingPower.description: (Required) - Describes the heating power used in the hot stage MEMS

sampleBias.description: (Required) - Describes the bias voltage applied to the sample in the hot stage MEMS

sampleResistance.description: (Required) - Describes the target Temperature used in the hot stage MEMS

pixelNumberType.description: describes the resolution of the image split into number of pixels in x and y directions.

xPixels.description: (Required) - no. of pixels in horizontal direction of datatype number

yPixels.description: (Required) - no. of pixels in vertical direction of datatype number
